channel.title: Soooo Many Rs-Remakes. -.-
channel.description:
I was just looking through server development Page.
(first page.) [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/25r339t.png[/img]
Loool, theres so many of these now, not as much as DSPK though, ( i don't think ).
Whats your opinions on RS-remakes?

item.title: Soooo Many Rs-Remakes. -.-
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

No more spam please

OT - I think eventually someone may get close to real RS remake. The more people that are putting effort into them, the closer we get

Read full topic

item.title: Soooo Many Rs-Remakes. -.-
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote=“pot up pls, post:2, topic:401678”][quote author=I Vain I link=topic=498738.msg3647103#msg3647103 date=1309466940]
this is a pointless topic.
[/quote]
Couldn’t Care, Still a discussion. :)[/quote]
No, this isn’t a discussion, this is you bitching at people who are actually doing some work for the community for no reason.

Read full topic

item.title: Soooo Many Rs-Remakes. -.-
item.dc:creator: @l3etal3lade l3etal3lade
item.description:
@l3etal3lade wrote:

I Vain I:

this is a pointless topic.

How many times have you raised your post count due to second hand moderation? And there will always be someone who wants the old days of RS back, but thats the good thing withe everyone being able to make their own server, you can have a huge diversity, although noone likes to cuzz have the coding is prolly still involved in the leech leak cycle. Where a small minority do all the work, and the other larger group reaps the benefits and claims glory.

Read full topic

item.title: Soooo Many Rs-Remakes. -.-
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

Tu:

the concept is getting unoriginal (even though it already was to begin with) but if you are bothered by them and have the nerve to post a thread dedicated to your disapproval then by all means do something about it

Copying RS, unoriginal - no way!?

Read full topic

item.title: Soooo Many Rs-Remakes. -.-
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

[quote=“runewings317, post:8, topic:401678”][quote author=Slave Scyth link=topic=498738.msg3647302#msg3647302 date=1309476164]

[quote author=runewings317 link=topic=498738.msg3647266#msg3647266 date=1309474355]
I don’t know if mine will ever be hosted (but I still want to finish :P). Reason their so big now is cause all other servers have loaders and their all the same :L

After this, I’m gunna make an awesome server :3
[/quote]You haven’t been here very long if you think any servers have ever been different from each other.

Ah, the old days of training on hay, doors and dummies…
[/quote]I was playing RS-PS wayyyy before I joined MoparScape xD (actually a whole 3 years). When I say their alike, I mean they allllll have loaders. If you find one without a loader, its almost a miracle O_o[/quote]Ah, I gotcha.

Read full topic
